name: Doomcity
description:
This game is a Game-a-week project. This weeks topic is "end of the world"

Assets from Unity Asset Store I used:

Mini first person controller: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/input-management/mini-first-person-c...

8K Skybox Pack Free:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/8k-skybox-pack-f...

FX Fire Free:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/fire-explosions/fx-fire-free...
